body.p: The Battle of Lake Erie took place on September 10, 1813, as a part of the war of 1812. The battle took place on Lake Erie near Put-in-Bay, Ottawa County, Ohio. It was a naval battle between the United States, led by Oliver Hazard Perry, and the United Kingdom, led by Robert Heriot Barclay.

bibl.p: Gerard T. Altoff, Oliver Hazard Perry and the Battle of Lake Erie (Put-In-Bay, Ohio: Perry Group, 1999); James Cooke Mills, Oliver Hazard Perry and the Battle of Lake Erie (Detroit: John Phelps, 1913).
